heading: HR01730
0: RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DELAY OR OUTRIGHT FAILURE TO REMIT EMPLOYEES' CONTRIBUTIONS FOR PHILHEALTH WHICH RESULT IN THESE EMPLOYEES NOT BEING ABLE TO ACCESS THEIR BENEFITS UNDER THE NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE ACT OF 2013

status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2018-03-14
